name: BlocksBuster: Color Hole 3D
description:
here is your new addictive Flip game of hoover Color Hole 3D buster, an hyper casual Blocks game that will keep you hooked Run for hours!
The most challenging and fun game of 2019!
Just Tap control the Big hole, eat the colorful obstacles before they Kill you and protect your Twisty Hole from Bombs.

Game Features:
_ Roller Objects and Bombs
- Free to play
- One finger control
- Different Tricky obstacles and experience every time
- Endless gameplay
- 100+ Flip Levels
- Easy to play, hard to master
